job description:
Connexion Systems & Engineering, a Boston based IT and Engineering Solutions Company immediately seeks individuals with the following skills:

Job# bh8968

Data Analyst, Business Intelligence

Required: Tableau Desktop, TSQL, Working with large datasets

Preferred: MSSQL (SSMS/SSRS), Healthcare Information Systems.

Purpose

The BI (Business Intelligence) Data Analyst will source, analyze, and report data to enhance business operations. The position will support internal operational and coding teams, with an emphasis on developing visual data models to help spot trends, identify issues, and further optimize internal operational processes.

Duties and Responsibilities

Responsible for developing data models, advanced visual representation and standards for reporting
Delivers data and dashboards to process owners for maintenance where appropriate
Creates and maintains files and databases, compiling data from multiple sources, running queries, formatting tables/formulas/scripts, analyzing/interpreting/validating results, and developing reports/scorecards/charts/dashboards
Analyzes and organizes qualitative and quantitative clinical, financial, and administrative data from multiple sources and synthesizes results into meaningful reports and presentations, recommending follow-up actions where appropriate
Produces intuitive graphical interpretations of data sets for trending purposes
Adjusts workload as necessary to prioritize more urgent report and data requests related to quality of care issues or other requests
Ability to run "what if" scenarios using analytic tools
Assists with business analysis and workflow documentation
Qualifications

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skills, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodation may be made to enable individuals with disabilities perform the duties.

Education (Degrees, Certificates, Licenses, Etc.)

Bachelors degree or equivalent combination of education and experience preferred.

When responding to this job posting you MUST include the Job# and Job Title in your subject line.

Duration: Contract to Permanent

Rate 25-35/hr. or 50-65K

Locations: Bedford, MA

Contact Info:

ConneXion Systems & Engineering

490 Boston Post Road

Sudbury, MA 01776
